    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddTrustedReviewerPage
    This page allows students to search for reviewers that are not on their trusted reviewer list and select as many as they want to add to that list.
    AdminHomePage
    AdminHomePage represents the main dashboard for admin users.
    AdminSetupPage
    SetupAccountPage class handles the account setup process for new users.
    AdminUserModifyPage
    A page that displays details on a user, allowing creation, updating, and deletion of user roles.
    AdminUserPage
    Displays a list of all users for modification.
    AlertBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing an Alert.
    Answer
    Represents an answer to a question in the system.
    Answers
    Repository class for managing Answer entities in the database.
    AnswersTable
    Defines the schema for the "Answers" table.
    AnswersTest
    Unit tests for the Answers repository.
    App
    The entry point for the application.
    AppContext
    Centralized application context for managing the database, routing, and repositories.
    BaseDatabaseTest
    Base test class that sets up an in-memory H2 database for testing.
    BaseEntity
    Abstract class representing a base entity with a common primary key field.
    BasePage
    Base class for all pages in the application.
    BaseTable
    Base class that each table extends to define columns and optional inline constraints (e.g., foreign keys).
    ButtonBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing a Button.
    CheckBoxBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing a CheckBox.
    ClearDatabase
    Utility class for clearing the entire database.
    CopyButtonBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing a Button that copies text to the clipboard.
    DataAccessException
    A runtime exception that wraps any SQLException or general data access error.
    DatabaseConnection
    Manages the connection to the H2 database.
    DesignGuide
    Provides system-wide constants and utilities for consistent design.
    EmailValidator
    Provides methods for validating email strings based on standard formatting rules.
    EmailValidator.State
    Enumeration representing the different states of email processing.
    EmailValidatorTest
    Unit tests for the EmailValidator class.
    EntityValidator
    Provides validation methods for various entities within the system.
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    Helpers
    This utility class provides general-purpose helper methods for various functionalities such as generating random codes and retrieving the current timestamp.
    HomepageButtonBuilder
    Builder class for creating a homepage button that navigates to the user's homepage.
    InstantiateApp
    Main entry point for the JavaFX application.
    InstructorHomePage
    The InstructorHomePage class provides an interface for instructors to manage reviewer requests.
    InvitationPage
    InvitationPage class represents the page where an admin can generate an invitation.
    Invite
    Represents an invitation in the system, including a random invite code, associated user ID, roles, and the creation timestamp.
    Invites
    Repository class for managing Invite entities in the database.
    InviteTable
    Defines the schema for the "Invites" table.
    IRepository<T>
    Generic repository interface for performing CRUD operations on entities extending BaseEntity.
    LabelBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing a Label.
    Message
    Represents a message in the system.
    Messages
    Repository class for managing Message entities in the database.
    MessagesTable
    Defines the schema for the "Messages" table.
    MyPages
    Enum representing all the page routes in the application.
    NameValidator
    Provides methods for validating name strings according to specified criteria.
    NameValidator.State
    Enumeration representing the different states of name validation processing.
    NameValidatorTest
    Unit tests for the NameValidator class.
    NavMenuBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing a navigation menu.
    OneTimePassword
    Represents a one-time password (OTP) used for authentication or validation.
    OneTimePasswords
    Repository class for managing OneTimePassword entities in the database.
    OneTimePasswordTable
    Defines the schema for the "OneTimePasswords" table.
    PageRouter
    Handles page navigation in the application.
    PasswordFieldBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing a PasswordField.
    PasswordUtil
    This utility class provides methods for hashing passwords and verifying hashed passwords using the Argon2 hashing algorithm.
    PasswordUtilTest
    Unit tests for the PasswordUtil class.
    PasswordValidator
    Provides methods for validating password strings according to specified criteria.
    PasswordValidator.State
    Enumeration representing the different states of password processing.
    PasswordValidatorTest
    Unit tests for the PasswordValidator class.
    PrivateMessage
    Represents a private message in the system.
    PrivateMessageConvoPage
    Represents the private message conversation page.
    PrivateMessagePage
    Represents the page where users can send a private message in response to a specific question.
    PrivateMessages
    Repository class for managing PrivateMessage entities in the database.
    PrivateMessagesTest
    Unit tests for the PrivateMessages repository.
    PrivateMessageTable
    Defines the schema for the "PrivateMessages" table.
    Question
    Represents a question in the system, including its associated message and title.
    Questions
    Repository class for managing Question entities in the database.
    QuestionsTable
    Defines the schema for the "Questions" table.
    QuestionsTest
    Unit tests for the Questions repository.
    ReadMessages
    Repository class for managing read messages.
    ReadMessages.ReadMessagePivot
    Represents a pivot between user and message, indicating whether the message has been read.
    ReadMessagesTable
    Defines the schema for the "ReadMessages" table.
    ReadMessagesTest
    Unit tests for the ReadMessages repository.
    ReplyList
    Displays page with all replies of an answer.
    Repository<T>
    Abstract repository class providing common database operations for entities extending BaseEntity.
    Repository.SqlConsumer
    Functional interface for setting parameters in a PreparedStatement.
    Repository.SqlFunction<R>
    Functional interface for mapping a single row in a ResultSet to some object.
    Repository.SqlOperation<R>
    Functional interface for an operation returning a result (possibly a query).
    ResetPasswordPage
    ResetPasswordPage class represents the page where an admin can reset a user's password.
    Review
    Represents a review given by a user to a reviewer.
    ReviewerHomePage
    This page displays a simple welcome message for the user and provides navigation.
    ReviewerProfileWindow
    Pop-up window displaying a reviewer's profile including their contact information and reviews
    ReviewerRequest
    Represents a request to become a reviewer in the system.
    ReviewerRequests
    Repository class for managing ReviewerRequest entities in the database.
    ReviewerRequestsTable
    Defines the schema for the "ReviewerRequests" table.
    ReviewerRequestsTest
    Unit tests for the ReviewerRequests repository.
    Reviews
    Repository class for managing Review entities in the database.
    ReviewsTable
    Defines the schema for the "Reviews" table.
    ReviewsTest
    Unit tests for the Reviews repository.
    Roles
    This enumeration defines various user roles within the system.
    RolesUtil
    This utility class provides methods for managing user roles represented as bitwise integers.
    RolesUtilTest
    Unit tests for the RolesUtil class.
    Route
    Annotation that marks a class as a routed page.
    SchemaManager
    Responsible for creating or syncing all tables whenever the app starts.
    SearchUtil
    This utility class provides search functionalities using fuzzy matching and full-text indexing.
    SearchUtilTest
    Unit tests for the SearchUtil class.
    Session
    Holds application-wide session information.
    SetPassPage
    SetPassPage represents the page where an admin can generate a one-time password for a selected user.
    SetupAccountPage
    SetupAccountPage class handles the account setup process for new users.
    SetupLoginSelectionPage
    Represents the initial account setup selection page.
    TableSyncUtil
    Provides utilities for synchronizing table schemas within a relational database.
    TextFieldBuilder
    Builder class for creating and customizing a TextField.
    TrustedReviewerPage
    This page allows students to add or remove reviewers from their personal trusted reviewers list.
    UIFactory
    Utility class to reduce JavaFX boilerplate code.
    User
    Represents a user in the system with personal and role-based information.
    UserHomePage
    Constructs the UserHomePage and initializes the layout and user interface components.
    UserLoginPage
    The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts.
    UsernameValidator
    The UsernameValidator class provides a static method for validating usernames based on specific criteria such as length, allowed characters, and starting character.
    UsernameValidator.State
    The State enum represents the states used in the validation process.
    UsernameValidatorTest
    Unit tests for the UsernameValidator class.
    UserQuestionDisplay
    UserQuestionDisplay page shows the current user's questions (and reserved space for answers).
    Users
    Repository class for managing User entities in the database.
    UsersTable
     
    UsersTest
    Unit tests for the Users repository.
    View
    Optional annotation for specifying window metadata like title, width, and height.
    WelcomeLoginPage
    The WelcomeLoginPage class displays a welcome screen for authenticated users.
